data.name: ZuVillage Georgia Campaign
data.description: Join the ZuVillage Georgia campaign to support the development of a popup village where you can expand your individual cognitive sovereignty while collectively exploring and building frontier tech guided by cypherpunk and d/acc philosophies.

data.name: Berlin Pizza Party Campaign
data.description: Support the Berlin Pizza Party campaign to bring together the community for fun and delicious pizza parties in Berlin.

data.name: Tokyo Pizza Party Campaign
data.description: Join the Tokyo Pizza Party campaign to enjoy fun and delicious pizza parties with the community in Tokyo.
